title: Textile, "Love and friendship", 1801–25
medium: Printed by engraved roller or short plate on cotton plain weave.
description: Three scenes, captioned in French, an amorous couple in a boat steered by Cupid on their way to an island, a sleeping couple in a boat returned form an island and a central scene showing a couple and Father Time.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Love and friendship", 1801–25.
1801–25. Printed by engraved roller or short plate on cotton plain weave.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-189.
